formattedAddress: 632 W 171st St, New York, NY 10032, USA
adrFormatAddress: 632 W 171st St, New York, NY 10032, USA

originalText.text: I honestly have never came across a daycare where they are so family oriented yet educational. I love that my child comes home with something new to tell me everyday. It lets me know that he is learning there! I love the structure and how they prepare children to go into school ahead of the game. My child is two and already learning how to write! Highly recommend it! I was referred by a friend whose child use to go there. So that also lets me know that not only they served quality learning and care but that they are still doing so years later!

originalText.text:
I love this Daycare , They are Phenomenal.
My girls are currently enrolled and this is a excellent Pogram for children. They educate the kids teach them about culture have spirit days have  field trips and the list could go on. I would definitely recommend this childcare facility to everyone looking for quality childcare.

originalText.text: My daughter has been at this daycare since she was 10 weeks old and she turns 2 next week.  She is so excited when we show up and runs to the door, often not even bothering to say bye to me. It puts me at peace knowing she is in a place she enjoys.  The providers care for the kids as if they were their own and have become our extended family.  They feed the kids a balanced breakfast and lunch and make learning fun. My daughter can already count, knows her ABCs and can recognize numbers and letters. She loves learning and the daycare really nurtures and encourages her.  Without a doubt would highly recommend this daycare to anyone!!!

originalText.text: I highly recommend Dreams 4 the kidz Daycare. It brought me a peace of mind knowing that my child was in great hands. The providers are very loving, nurturing, and professional. Not only do they provide great care, they also provide education for your child. My child has advanced tremendously and is very independent. My child started PRE-K 4 showing off by writing her name on her own. Thank you for all your hard work and dedication. May god continue to bless your business. üôè
